ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 28
ygData.msgSnippet: The keys are to be given to the slaves in the slave pit at CB.  However, it is not possible to know their equivalent numnber before attepting to give it to
ygData.messageBody:
The keys are to be given to the slaves in the slave pit at CB. However, it
is not possible to know their equivalent numnber before attepting to give it
to one. If you get the right one, you get some XP.

Hope this helps,


Holte, lvl 5 HIE Enchanter, Veeshan
Pugofcrydee, lvl 12 HIE Magician, Veeshan
Holtus, lvl 3 HEF Bard, Veeshan
Macrostheblack, lvl 3 HIE Wizard, Veeshan

> Subject: shackle key #17
>
> Hiya All and Well Met,
> I was out wandering the woods about Crushbone the other day
> and got into
> a wee bit of a fight with a slaver.... bad luck for him! When the dust
> cleared, I was left with some decent coin.... and this little key
> for shackle
> 17.... anyone have any idea what it can be used for? Sure looks
> interesting
> to me.....
> Thank ye in advance for any of yer good
> thinking on this!
> - Talyria, the
> mischief-making wood
> elf!

> Message: 2
> Date: Thu, 10 Jun 1999 10:45:55 -0400
> From: "Jeff" <jeffh@...>
> Subject: Re: shackle key #17
>
>
> > cleared, I was left with some decent coin.... and this little key for
> shackle
> > 17.... anyone have any idea what it can be used for? Sure looks
> interesting
>
> Give a copper piece to each slave you come across. They will tell you what
> key number they require. Give the key to the one that needs key 17...
>
>
> Laedain, 13th Level Druid (Wood Elf) Tarew Marr
